website_summaries.verdict: Impressive speakers with balanced sound and attractive looks. Two for the price; a great choice for building a surround-sound system.
pros: A solid set of speakers with durable craftsmanship
Quality sound and a slim profile
Easy to install in almost any area
cons: A few issues with faulty speakers that emit static or buzzing sounds

customer_reviews.title: great look, awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: The installation of these speakers look great. I'm not surprised that the sound quality is awesome as well. Amazon has a combo purchase of these with the center speaker and two rear/ceiling speakers, which I was happy to have taken advantage of. I finished off the setup with Polk's 12" subwoofer as well. I had read that some customers noticed that there was some rattling from the mesh covers - I have not experienced this at all after some loud movies. Even during installation, the mesh covers fit very snug and don't give me any reason to believe that they will be an issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Phil - Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: The sounds is great but the housing components are shoddy
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is great and the price can't be beat. 5 stars on the speaker output and quality. One star deduction for the plastic rough-in components. If you are not careful screwing the self-closing clamps of the housing to the drywall during installation, you will crack the plastic and it will no longer hold the wall. Be careful and gentle and you will not have any issues. If you rush or force this, you will have one or two corners broken and not snug to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: bvh817

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the sound and these are steal at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I used these as my front presence speakers and the rear surround on a 9.1 system with my yahama RX-A3060 receiver. They have great sound for movies and music. Only true audiophiles would be able to find something to complain about these speakers. I walfalled for a week between the 6" and 8" models. The 6" are more than adequate for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Krueger

customer_reviews.title: They sound amazing (I am watching JAWS right now) and these speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these today. Could not wait to install them As the other reviews said, Polk made it a breeze. Measure your spot; check for wall studs; tape up and trace the supplied template; cut out drywall, connect wires and lock it down. They sound amazing (I am watching JAWS right now) and these speakers are making the shark even scarier!!! I opted for the 8 inch woofer model and I am happy I did. Combined with my Earthquake subwoofer, there is plenty down low and up top. I will strongly consider the smaller Polk audio speakers for the rear channels now that this was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Arabian

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. Installed in wall in new basement build. Contracter left boxes with the wire pulled through. Only complaint is that unless you are in the center of a wall cavity, the arms hit the studs on the sides and won't anchor well. Would like it better if they could be adjusted to ancher top and bottom rather than sides. Because it doesn't let you change it, the bottom corner of my speaker sticks out a bit from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nickshorty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the RC85 speaker in hopes that I might be able to sneak it in between a few studs. Unfortunately, it wasn't going to work and I replaced with the RC65 speaker. All I can say is wow... the Bass from these speakers is amazing. I'm running a Sonos amp to these speakers and it is incredible. I would highly recommend! The Sonos amp is quirky but these speakers are top notch. The pictures are next to the Keiid 8" in ceiling speakers that I installed on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor mounting material
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten all the way hooked up yet, so not sure how they sound. Will update afterwards. The mounting clips it comes with are cheap plastic, don't use a drill to install them or you will over tighten them pretty easy and they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Clarity and imaging - if you want to shake the room get a subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: So the truth is I was a recording engineer and didn't have much expecation for these - but they have fantastic imaging and frequency response. If you really want to move some air you will need a sub woofer to go with them but these are in my kitchen ceiling and I am pleasantly surprised everytime i turn them on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had Polk bookshelf speakers and these were a replacement for those. I am very happy with the sound and installation process. I painted mine a different shade of white than what is came as. If they had provide the wall cut out template with lines for creating the paint template for painting the outer edges of the speakers, that would have been nice. I just cut the wall template down to lay on top of the speaker face to spray the speaker frames.
customer_reviews.author: MSL CZM

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The installation template included made installing these speakers much easier than I imagined. Polk also includes clear plastic covers for your speakers so you can paint the border without worrying about overspray...and it works flawlessly. The sound is great (for in-wall speakers obviously). Tower speakers make up my mains and sound much better. I use these as my surround sound only. My only complaint is that the border of the speaker has a textured look/feel to it. I had to smooth it out to get that slick gloss look.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. VanKuiken

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for a classic wall/cieling speaker
customer_reviews.text: Replaces 23 year old Polk speakers of the same dimisions so they fit exactly in the original ceiling cut outs. Big improvements in: sound quality, speaker materials, installation options, and ease of installation. The double decade speakers that made our rec room sound so great had finally needed replacement (in our low-humidity home). I was thrilled to find out that Polk still made this great speaker and that they would fit in the same cut outs. Installation was 5 min per each and made very simple with the auto-grab set screws. They even sound better than the last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kassey

customer_reviews.title: In-Ceiling garage speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed a pair of these in the garage ceiling to bring music into that space. I even built some enclosures for them out of MDF to close up the back sides and improve the response (rather than having the back-sides openly exposed to the attic). Easy to install and sound really good. Bass response is satisfactory enough that I don't feel like I really really need a subwoofer right now, but I might still end up adding one later on just because I like a lot of bass.
customer_reviews.author: adamg

customer_reviews.title: A bit tinnie and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Wall speakers have inherent problems with lack of any enginered enclosure and the construction of the wall... But i felt these speakers where tinnie” and cheap,,,, I used them anyway and added a mid band center speaker and sub to balance these....
customer_reviews.author: Auslander

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Painted them black, just had to take off the fabric behind the grill. Looks great and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but don't screw up the install.
customer_reviews.text: These sound pretty good.. but watch out the grills are really difficult to get off once you have put them in.. you have to pry up the corner and you WILL bend it if you are not super super careful. So before you put that grill on you better be darn sure you don't need them off.
customer_reviews.author: James from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speakers, looks good in ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: Used these in the ceiling outside in my patio area. Loud enough and sound was good quality even with them open into the attic without being boxed in.may still do that though to hear the difference if any. Have mine connected to a PYLE amplifier and PYLE switch box so I can switch between these speakers and the ones in the house. If you use the template and stay at least 1/2” from any stud, then these are easy to install and remove if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Giffen

customer_reviews.title: Replaced some Infinity in wall speakers with these
customer_reviews.text: They really look and sound great. My old Infinities got dry rot, and I tried these Polk speakers. They really sound nice and the low end is as impressive as others have said. Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra O.

customer_reviews.title: Another 5 star review!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace a blown out set of older Boston acoustics. So are far as wall mounted speaker comparison, I can’t offer much. I do have to say that these sound great and installed very easy. You can’t beat the price for quality either. Very pleased. Love the adjustable tweeter, speakers have good bass. The securing anchors worked great for me and offered up a very nice and flush finished install.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Boy

customer_reviews.title: YEP! These are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: The Polk Audio RC85I two way speaker is something to behold! The sound quality is unreal, and it since I am pushing them with the Yamaha RX-A 3080, man, oh man, you cannot believe the sound! Get a pair! You will enjoy them! The only portion that I still like, but hope Polk would upgrade is the speaker cover. They should be magnetic like Sonance in wall speakers!
customer_reviews.author: BIG E

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't install it but my installer didn't seem to have any issues. Love the way it looks flush mounted to my wall. Since these don't have any kind of enclosure behind them, it is a bit loud in the room behind them if anyone is sleeping, etc. I have to watch my noise levels when I'm watching tv. Sound quality has been great. I would definitely recommend it. Great value for the price compared to other options.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden Jessen

customer_reviews.title: Love them just as much the 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: Used these as the side 2 speakers in the ceiling for a 7.1 surround sound setup. Very easy to install, although a bit nerve-racking to cut such a big hole in the wall! I had these in a previous house surround setup and bought them again. They sound great!
customer_reviews.author: bptexas

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my media room and the sound is awesome, I installed 4 as surround sound and it totally changed the room, I can now easily here my surround speakers. Painting is a not easy and dont try a cloth/sponge. Using spray paint with several very light coats worked best for me, trying to re-use my wall paint with cheap sprayer didnt work, had to match a can at the store and use that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and attractive, covers could use a redesign.
customer_reviews.text: Sound good once broken in. Don't like the cover design. They're difficult to fit correctly and very difficult to paint with latex paints as the paint clogs the tiny holes. I had to remove the inner material and throw away, paint and then use compressed air to unclog the holes but the air blows the paint away. Repeated that process a half dozen times until I was satisfied with it. If I ever had to remove the covers I'd definitely bend the $h!t out of them as they fit way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice not to have floor speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Love them instead of having floor speakers collecting dust around them. Easy to install with the template. I had wires in the walls when I built the house so that part of the install was relatively easy. I love my infinity floor speakers but the low profile in the wall makes up for missing the ones on the floor hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Surveyguy

customer_reviews.title: Balanced high-fidelity sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in the ceiling of my porch. The sound is amazing. Good, balanced sound with the amplifier running with flat bass and treble. Crank them to get the party started and the sound stays clean and balanced. Highly recommended. It's too soon to know how they'll hold up but they are protected from direct rain although blowing rain could potentially get to them. Also installed the 6" round version in my kitchen and master bathroom ceilings as well and they are also 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Macaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great installation.
customer_reviews.text: Received the RC85i pair yesterday and installed them today. Great sound and like the directional tweeter. I installed these in the ceiling (rather than walls) with no problem. The template that it comes with is no joke. I was cutting shy of the pencil outline like I had seen in some youtube.com install videos and it was not needed (actually made it more work). The template is just right to get a very secure fit and has a flashing on it to give ample coverage for misgivings. Yes, would totally order again! And plan on ordering more of these for the other three channels.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Speakers on the Patio
customer_reviews.text: Square or rectangular speakers are always easier to install, and that's the upside. Not sure whether it's because they're outside in the ceiling of my patio, but they don't sound as good as the ten Theater Solutions TS65C In Ceiling 6.5" Speakers i have throughout four rooms of my house.
customer_reviews.author: texasatty

customer_reviews.title: Boxes
customer_reviews.text: I was able to make boxes since the wall is open behind the speakers, they sound a lot fuller. If you have the space or don't mind patching sheetrock I highly recommend it. Just make it close enough to a beam and stud to screw it to on two sides. I've always liked Polk and still do
customer_reviews.author: Darren Lobb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for in-wall surround system.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. My only issue is that to remove the speaker cover (grill), you have to be careful not to scratch or damage it because you have to gently pry it off. But that's not really a negative as most in wall speakers are the same. My Klipsch speaker has a magnetic cover... Much better design. I would recommend these... But not as a center channel speaker. Arguably the center speaker is the most important of the surround system, so spend a few extra dollars to get a high end one. I would definitely recoo
customer_reviews.author: David V. Cirillo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a good price
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I went with these for my surround sound. They are very well made and sound great. Installation was a bit more than I thought it would be, but that was more about cutting the holes and running the wires than actually mounting the speakers. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these (we moved and left the first pair in the wall) and they do sound great for the money! I took the time to add a barrier above and below, to make the wall into a smaller "enclosure" for the speaker and I did notice a marked improvement in the bass response from the first install. I am not sure I got the optimum size right for the speaker, but I am very pleased with the sound from these, especially given the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This was a great upgrade, love the paintable grills. Easy install, just take some time before you cut your holes. Measure three times, cut once. And buy some good speak wire for your runs.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding in-wall speakers and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few different types of inwall speakers and these are the best I've heard for the price. They were very easy to install with the provided template (Need to cut a slightly bigger hole that the template though). You place them in the hole you cut and turn the screws to tighten the latches (Like an "old work" electrical box). Also, you can paint the trim and the grill to mask them in the wall. I would highly recommend for the sound clarity and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diamondfish

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality 👍🏻😊 Design & appearance 👍🏻😊 In-wall (renovation) installation ease 👍🏻😊 Cut-out template included 👍🏻😊 HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tee

customer_reviews.title: As expected....a VERY GOOD POLK PRODUCT....
customer_reviews.text: I have (2) Polk tower speakers and needed to expand my range of the center.... I added two Polk in the ceiling, above the TV and they work flawlessly with my Yamaha receiver.... Could not be happier.....
customer_reviews.author: Karl Jungel

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence on whether or not to buy these, having never had much experience with in wall speakers, but I can say they are easy to in stalled and sound just as good as boxed speakers, I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have really good sound to them. After my husband finished installing them in our ceiling he put on the white covers and they look nice they do not take away from the appearance of my room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Every one at home likes the sound of these speakers. It was nerve wracking to cut the holes in the walls, but worked out fine. I like having the adjustable tweeter. Replaced some smaller surround sound speakers with these make a real difference.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research before purchasing. We purchased these speakers because the ratings were good and we wanted a good product within our budget. We installed these Polk speakers in our basement. They have great sound and were easy to install. Win win for us! We love them and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Polk does it again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers as rear surround for my family room home theater system. I have them mounted in the ceiling and they sound great! A lot more mid bass thank I expected and crisp highs. Sounds good with music and movies. It’s a great deal for the price, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are good all around speakers as they work well with both voice and music reproduction. We have used these in several large auditoriums and home theaters and have never had a complain about there sound quality. Simple to install... Use the included template to mark your opening, cut the opening, wire the speaker using the stab lock connectors then insert in opening and tighten the self rotating clasp locks using a screw driver. A recommended product for the pro installer and the DIY installer.
customer_reviews.author: Parrotheadjoe

customer_reviews.title: They are well designed and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to beat the quality of build and sound these speakers add to your 5.1 or 7.1 system for the price. They are well designed and easy to install. It comes with a stencil for cutting the hole in the sheet rock. My only complaint is that more content should have surround sound. Far too often these speakers are not utilized, especially on TV shows.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: I used the Polk mounting brackets on a new build and they worked perfectly with the speakers. They sound great over wide ranges in movies and music. The entire system shakes the house and upsets my wife, so they must be good.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers perform great. I painted them to match the walls in my family room and them are practically invisible. This is important for me since I'm hoping that the children will not notice them and have no reason to destroy them on me. I've got them set a part of a 5.1 system. They handle plenty of bass, but I've got the crossover set to about 80 so the my sub handles the lions share. Even my wife admits that they sound great. And as a plus, she likes how they look. Everyone wins!
customer_reviews.author: J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Easy install if there are no studs in the way. Sound great. Look nice without the grills. Used for surrounds too. Decent bass but I use a sub. Different bezel than my center but not really noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of sound
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t tell you how easy I installed these speakers in the wall. Formaly had two smaller speakers in the wall so I had to cut out little more. I’m happy with sound great tweeter also base as well. I was worried about the base
customer_reviews.author: Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After months of research, I decided to go with these RC85i Polk's for my front speakers in my 5.1 surround. I also purchased the Polk RC65i Speakers for my rear surround speakers. These are nothing short of amazing. For the price, that are above and beyond what I had expected. Everything comes through nice and clear, and the surround sound is top notch. I'm using a Yamaha RX-V61 Receiver to push these, and it sounds great. I couldn't be more pleased with the product and delivery. Buy these, you will not regret it! I'm also awaiting the arrival of my Polk CS10 Center Channel Speaker to complete my configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I like how well they fit with insulation
customer_reviews.text: For the price, can’t beat these hooked up to a Sonos amp. Have them paired with the pb50 and gets a 850sqft kitchen/living room going! I like how well they fit with insulation. The jbl’s where huge. These fit 2x4 wall, with some insulation (I just pull the vapor barrier and make a small pocket for the woofer)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio RC85i Review
customer_reviews.text: The speakers look and sound great. I gave them a four (4) star rating because of the following: 1. It would have been nice if Polk had provided two (2) templates in the box. 2. If the instructions were a little more clear about how exact you have to cut the holes and how to properly utilize the drywall screws (which attach inside the drywall) 3. An extra drywall screw or two would have also been nice. As for the speakers, they sound awesome. I use them as fronts for my surround sound, replaced Polk RM8 Satellites, even my wife has noticed a significant difference in the quality of sound we now get. I would recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Replaced poor quality Yamaha speakers with these, amazingly better quality. After painting they nearly disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Brittoni

customer_reviews.title: Small, good quality speakers that were easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for decent, in-wall speakers that were small, but capable. These speakers work perfectly, look good, and deliver decent sound. I'm driving them with an amplifier that delivers 100W per channel as surround speakers. Installation was simple and instructions were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wayne

customer_reviews.title: The build quality and sound are terrific for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The template made the installation painless, and the build quality and sound are terrific for the price. 15 minutes with a wallboard saw, level and tape measure, 24 screws later, and all four were installed and sounding great. So good that now I'm going to upgrade my center, mains, and sub to Polk gear. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Crolley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have these in a couple rooms in my home for over a year along with the RC80i ceiling speakers and I love them. Installation is easy if you follow the template for cutting the hole. They hold in place with plastic clips that hold securely. Just don't overtighten the or they may break off. It didn't happen to me, but I could see it happening. Sound is fantastic. I use them mostly for TV viewing and piping music throughout the house, but they can handle the volume too. I highly recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound quality! Nice tight punching bass and crystal clear highs! A very noticeable improvement from our old in wall speakers in our church hall. Powered 4 of these with a Behringer 4 channel rackmount amp (50w/ch) and it works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heisdorf

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I know you can get higher quality speakers, but for me the price vs sound is great. I have 4 of them hooked to a Sony home theater receiver as front and rear surrounds. The sound is great for our home theater for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying these speakers along with the sub combo. Buy them you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rod P

customer_reviews.title: Sound great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our home theatre system. Using them as the front left & right speakers. Had a handyman install them in the wall and they look great and sound even better!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker 2nd Pair
customer_reviews.text: Flush mounted in the wall above Television. Have 15ft. ceilings so work great for the surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Zelinski

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers-Great Sound-Installed in Ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Great sound installed in my ceiling. Wonderful highs and lows. Well worth the money. Amazon is the cheapest place to get the best stuff! B___ B__ tried to sell my husband a set of speakers that were over $9K total. I called C________d and asked for a list of the best speakers for a ceiling application and got these. I searched Amazon and...BAM they were right here! Great price, great value, great speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Monica D.

customer_reviews.title: They sound awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to these after using a little smaller Pyle in wall speakers, these are much better! Glad I upgraded all 4 in my surround sound system!
customer_reviews.author: No Deal

customer_reviews.title: I installed these speakers as the main zone stereo speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed these speakers as the main zone stereo speakers at our beach house. Although they are a little lite in the low end, the overall sound quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: qpt

customer_reviews.title: Clean sound, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these speakers along with a Polk sub for my home theater system. The directional tweeter was important for me because not all of my speakers would point exactly the same way. The sound is great! Installation is easy and the only tricky part is getting the covers back on perfectly straight. I did have one cover fall off but I'm sure it was due to the fact I had the volume all the way up and that 8 inch woofer was pumping hard. Overall very satisfied!! Thanks Polk!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Fenton

customer_reviews.title: These are great speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Over the last four years I have purchased a total of 14 of Polk Audio speakers. I have installed them in the ceilings and walls all over my house as well as a pair of their atrium speakers outside. I have never been disappointed and they have stood the test of time. They produce a good quality sound that I am pleased with and on occasion my kids and I have definitely tested their capacity with some very high volume. They have always handled it with no trouble. I strongly recommend them to any one looking to set up a whole house audio system or home theater.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cozine

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Installed these for front middle ceiling speakers for Dolby Atmos. They sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great. Installation was straight forward. Instructions were clear. Glad I installed these. These have more low end mid range than my last speakers. My wife really wanted to hide our rear surrounds so she made me get these. They really warmed up the overall sound of our system.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McLain

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Sound  Speaker that is affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Having had Klipsch speakers I like high quality sound and these are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great overall speakers
customer_reviews.text: As others have said there is now much bass but overall great speakers. Been a fan of Polk for a very long time and these did not disappoint. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: ... and I have found these to be a very good sounding speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am using as rear surround speakers and I have found these to be a very good sounding speaker for the price. The directional tweeter is a nice touch that enables you to better tailor the sound to your seating location. They are also easily installed. Be aware though that it is a fairly large in-wall speaker, and while this contributes to the quality of the sound, you need to select your mounting location carefully.
customer_reviews.author: John Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good performance, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Mids and highs are fine. Bass not so much -- but we are only talking about a 6.5" woofer here. Good construction and very solid. Wiring job is top notch. No materials included that would absorb moisture. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: lopocg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and price
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers. I’m using them as my rear surround sound. I had some JBL before now I’ve replaced them with these. Clarity is a whole lot better
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pooran

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these around my family room along with a CSI center channel speaker and a matching Polk sub. The sound is great whether in stereo or surround. The 8" is probably overkill as the sub takes over before the low end of these is really needed, but I thought it would be nice for some 2 speaker stereo use only. I put the rear channels in about 4 years ago and then fronts in last week. I shouldn't have waited that long as the fronts made a huge improvement over my older bookshelf speakers.
customer_reviews.author: GR8Dane

customer_reviews.title: They've made installation easy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of speakers. Have had them for several months now and they work great. I especially liked the mounting system with the integrated clips as well as the included template to cut out the right size hole in the drywall. Just wish these speakers had the type of connectors that allow for banana clips.
customer_reviews.author: ViscousMF

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Easy to Install and Sound Great.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install, was actually surprised how easy it was. Just cut your hole using the outline/template provided, run your wire, put speaker in the hole and tighten the screws. Looks great and Sounds great. Mids and Highs sound very clean. Pair it with a Sub for even better sound. I listened to a few MoFi records and they sound great. Will update if anything changes but I am extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TwoThumbs

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Crisp, Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: Polk dose it Again. Very good Quality sound just love them using as our rear surround Speakers.
customer_reviews.author: wd lash

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these speakers.... good quality, easy to install, using them for rear surround sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are replacing high-quality speakers I bought at an expensive audio store for our rear surround sound speakers. We have used them in several modes - rear surround as well as regular "speaker" mode and I am extremely happy with these speakers. They sound great and were very easy to install. They also look good - nice grilles that are flush with the wall. They are paintable but I have not painted ours yet. Overall I'm very happy with these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Goldengate

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sound and a quick install. I replaced my wall mounted speaker with these in wall units. The directions are clear and the template and tools make it very easy. I install 9 speakers, all in wall in 2 hours, using a sheet rock hand saw. The sound quality is first rate professional and the finished install is clean and professional.
customer_reviews.author: ElectroGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part the speakers are great, but one of the wire ports on one speaker was very loose and had a VERY hard time keeping the wire in the port. Once I finally managed to get the wire installed they are great but was disappointed with how long they took to install because of the faulty wire port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and the sound quality is very good considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Good product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great would buy again easy install arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: cory a leinweber

customer_reviews.title: POLK SPEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: VERY PLEASED WITH THESE SPEAKERS. I MOUNTED THEM IN THE CEILING IN MY KITCHEN AND BOUGHT A SECOND PAIR FOR MY DINING ROOM, BUT I HAVE NOT INSTALLED THOSE YET. SOUND QUALITY IS VERY GOOD AND THEY ARE EASY TO PUT IN. I ADDED SOME INSULATION ON EACH SIDE OF THE SPEAKERS WHEN I INSTALLED THEM, AND I THINK THAT HELPED WITH THE BASS LEVEL. SHIPPING WAS GREAT. I WENT WITH THE STANDARD FREE SHIPPING AND RECEIVED THEM IN 2 DAYS. GREAT SERVICE FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away by the value
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more pleased by the quality and amazing sound I am getting from this speaker. After lots of research and not wanting to spend a fortune I settled on this and literally could not be happier. Friends and family are blown away at how good this sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jasa

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed. My $99 computer speakers sound better
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. My $99 computer speakers sound better. They don't sound terrible. But they're a little thin. Not much bass and the midrange is watery.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound without the ugly speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These sound GREAT!!! I had a contractor install these before we moved in to our new house and they are incredible. Paired with a nice subwoofer, your music will be TOO loud before you can even think about getting any distortion from these. These are quite large speakers. About twice the size I was imagining in my head. Look incredible painted.
customer_reviews.author: Gyakusetsu

customer_reviews.title: ... already in my wall from previous speakers that went bad. Like the warranty and easy fit
customer_reviews.text: The speakers fit the hole already in my wall from previous speakers that went bad. Like the warranty and easy fit. Sounds great also.
customer_reviews.author: REASTORK

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are great for a number of reasons
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great for a number of reasons: first of all they provide a great sound quality for an affordable price. They're ridiculously easy to install: all you'll need is a pencil, a dry-wall saw and a screwdriver. They also look great and the outer part can be painted to match your room. The only downside is you'll need to add a subwoofer if you want to hear the lower frequencies. If you do that, you'll get excellent sound
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A B Hori

customer_reviews.title: Polk - super sound for us!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers work so well that in the middle of our remodel, I bought two more sets - different sizes - and now have three sets of these speakers. They sound great and are extremely affordable. We love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is great - I'm using them for middle and rear speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is great - I'm using them for middle and rear speakers in a home theater. The mounting system works great - they seal to the wall perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet units!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Polk 7.2 surround. The tweeters are adjustable and they are super clear and loud even with my 14' ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Montoy

customer_reviews.title: Incrediable Speakers - Wish I had the room for more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to which arrive quickly from this supplier. The pseraks are everything and more of which everyone else is saying. Sound quality for the price, you will not get any better. I just wish I had the room and prewired the room for more of them. Next project will have at least 6 of these in it. Install is very easy, took less than 30 minutes for 2 of them start to finish. I did not paint mine yet, but this could be a bit tricky and could cause some issues. The holes look to be very small and could plug up with paint.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like them... they are on my outdoor patio mounted in the ceiling... sound great... plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Test Equipment Vendor

customer_reviews.title: My Polk review.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great. They were installed to replace a similar sized version of a pair of Bay Audio units. The bass doesn’t hit the same as the Bay Audios, but I’m OK with that. They really sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is larger than recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile; while I did add a 12" sub my setup, the 8" drivers provide enough oomph for most casual listening. I am using this on an inside wall with a fairly large cavity [~4cu], which is larger than recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hare

customer_reviews.title: Simple install. Sound great
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a pair of Polk Audio upright speakers for about 15 years and I needed a couple in-walls so I bought these. I ordered the larger ones first and returned them and bought these (thanks Amazon). My walls were already wired so I used the template provided and cut a hole in the wall, hooked them up and popped them in. It took about an hour. They look and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan4Life

customer_reviews.title: Quality speaker for entry/mid level surround system
customer_reviews.text: For the price youre not going to get anything better. Clear highs, good midrange, and something that could be considered bass. Nevertheless, if youre putting these on a surround system youre going to want a subwoofer anyway. Easy to install, just trace the template, cut out the hole, make your connections, and tighten six screws. The speaker tightens down on the drywall just like any old-work box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy these again
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these as surround speakers. They're easy to install and they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these speakers. We renovated our large master bedroom and he installed these in the ceiling. They are very powerful and the sound is very clear and he is very happy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers for Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: Placed two of these in our media room for the side channels of 7.1 surround. Great speakers. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Four_By_Four

customer_reviews.title: Best deal in Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace my outdoor speakers for the patio in sunny Arizona. Read all the reviews for this set on Amazon and decided that they were by far the best. I am thankful to all those individual out there that write every detail about these speakers. We rewired ours with monster cable and the quality and sound are amazing. I highly recommend them and the price cannot be beat with Amazon. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Quail Run

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my remodeled bathroom and pairing them with a Klipsch R-120sw. After putting them through their paces for a few months, i am tickled with the results. Even without the sub they can shake stuff off the shelves (tho the sub does help). My beer showers will never be the same!
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I had two speakers go bad in my living room and I figured it would be a great time to replace them with in wall speakers. I saw some great reviews and although I'm an audiophile I'm working on a budget. These were extremely simple to install using the included template and fit into my walls with no issues. I haven't painted them yet but even without the paint they look great. Great buy for the money and great choice for a new system installation on a budget. I plan on replacing all my speakers with these next month.
customer_reviews.author: E. Figueroa

AMAZON.COM


The Polk Audio RC85i 2-way In-wall Speaker delivers incredible sound to any room in your home without using any floor or shelf space. The RC85i is easy to install, requiring only that you cut a hole, feed the wires through, and simply drop the speaker in where it is held in place by rotating cams that safely secure the speaker with no extra assembly or mess. Once installed, the paintable grille and flange allows this in-wall speaker to virtually disappear in the room.

Polk Audio RC85i in-wall speakers in white. The Polk RC85i utilizes an eight-inch dynamic-balance, mineral filled polymer-composite cone with a rubber surround that outlasts cheaper foam surrounds, as well as a one-inch dynamic-balance, metalized soft dome tweeter with a swivel mount. The swivel-mounted tweeter is aimable for direct high frequency control that ensures spacious imaging with amazing clarity, and well-balanced sound in any listening position, even off-axis listening positions, rather than in just a small sweet spot. 

Constructed of durable, moisture resistant materials, the RC85i is safe for use in bathrooms, kitchens, saunas, or even under outdoor eaves, and features a wide-dispersion design for even sound-coverage throughout even large rooms. The RC85i also features infinite baffle tuning which uses the virtual enclosure of in-wall space for superior bass response, and is timbre-matched to the Polk Audio Monitor Series for seamless, enveloping imaging when used in a home theater system.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
RC85i speakers (pair), 2 grilles, cardboard template, owner's manual, and registration card.
